document.heading: Motor Vehicle Fees Amendment Act of 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-170, the “Motor Vehicle Fees Amendment Act of 1990,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-213, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 12, 1990, and June 26, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 12, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-235 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
